Title: Satan's Legion Runs Wild! The Curtain Rises on the Cell Games
Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryô Horikawa
Plot: The Z-Fighters and Android 16 arrive at the Cell Games Arena, and Mr Satan along with his disciples get ready to fight Cell.
